name: Late to Bed
description:
Oh no...
You stayed up too late again, and now you have to turn off the lights and run back to your room in the dark. Suddenly you feel tense as something is approaching you from the dark behind you.

In this Arcade Endless Runner you have to escape the thing in the dark by traversing the fear-distorted hallway. Using fast-paced 3D platforming to catch the remnants of light to propel you further down the hallway, you try to make it as far as you can.

The game uses a mix of procedurally generated hallways interspaced with neatly designed level chunks, creating a tense experience.

Controls:

  • WASD / Left-Analog - Run / Movement
  • Space / A - Jump
  • Shift / Right Trigger - Dash
  • Escape / Menu - Pause
